Action.author: odowdaibm
Action.body: I will create a short patchset for this now, and we'll build that out with ~Yogendrasri ~SjirNijssen ~cmgabriel Thanks for starting this!

Action.author: odowdaibm
Action.body: ~pandrejko ~eramitg ~joe-alewine This is a topic for you guys too!

Action.author: cmgabriel
Action.body: The approach we could take is to use the whitepaper from Chris Ferris based on the Cornell paper and use it as a basis for this topic to get going quickly. We can take relevant material to start the patchset and iterate it via the DWG meetings.

Action.author: sjirnijssen
Action.body: And let us spent some time on not only what it is, but also why, and if appropriate when. The focus as agreed during the DWG today call was on the structure, with the why, and only a little on process.
